subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Traditions and Culture.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Traditional instruments, such as the galoubet (a type of flute) and tambourin (a drum), are often used in folk music performances.
The city hosts the Festival de Carcassonne, which features music, theater, and dance performances in various historic venues.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Traditions and Culture.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: The troubadours of the medieval period, who composed and performed lyrical poetry, were particularly influential.
